mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART (CART_CODE, MEM_ID, PRO_NUM, AMOUNT) VALUES(CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mem_id}, #{pro_num}, DEFAULT);
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRO_IMG ,P.PRO_NAME, C.AMOUNT FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN CART C ON M.ID = C.MEM_ID INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PRO_NUM = P.PRO_NUM WHERE M.ID = #{mem_id}
